title: Sacro-sancta regum majestas, or, The sacred and royal prerogative of Christian kings. Wherein sovereignty is by Holy Scriptures, reverend antiquity, and sound reason asserted, by discussing of five questions. And the Puritanical, Jesuitical, antimonarchical grounds are disproved, and the untruth and weakness of their new-devised-state-principles are discovered. Dei gratia mea lux.
author: Maxwell, John, 1590?-1647.
publicationStmtPublisher: printed for Tho. Dring, over against the Inner-Temple-Gate in Fleet-street,
